Two Fast Gif
GIF generator
User Description
① File registration
  • You can register up to two.
① URL registration
  • You can register up to two.
  • Only URL with video type is allowed.
  • After pasting the URL, click Publish to register.
② Validation
  • If there are more than 2 files or URLs, they can be returned.
  • The size of each capacity of the file or URL is returned if it exceeds the allowed amount.
  • If it is not a convertible URL to GIF, it will be returned.
③ Setting GIF Options
  • FPS is higher-than-natural GIFs are created.
  • Resolution settings let you create a GIF of any size.
  • The higher the quality, the cleaner, but it takes longer.
  • You can set the time up to 59 minutes 59 seconds 99 milliseconds.
  • If you enter nothing in the time setting, it is created from beginning to end.
④ Complete GIF Transformation
  • Right, click the Download button to receive the generated GIF.
  • You can create more GIFs, but when you register new files or URLs and convert them, the previously created GIFs disappear.
FileURL
  1. You can convert up to 2 video files at the same time.
  2. Convertible file types are various video file types such as mp4, avi etc.
  3. fps25 converts up to 12 seconds, fps15 up to 20 seconds, and fps10 up to 30 seconds.
  4. Maximum height is 1200px and maximum width is 600px.
  5. The higher the resolution or the higher the frame, the longer the transition may take.
  6. The start and end times can be set to the second decimal place.
  7. feedback Email: mpdd1455@gmail.com
